titleStmt.title: A sermon upon Job 29, 15 preached before the judges at a general assise in Hertford when that good and charitable person Rowland Hales, Esquire, was high-sheriff of that shire / by David Stokes.
titleStmt.author: Stokes, David, 1591?-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall, for Richard Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
